Be Sure Of The Spirit's Guidance 
     The Lord God of heaven is constantly at work for us. His angels are ministering spirits to all who will receive their guardianship. Human impulse will try to make us believe that it is God who is guiding us, when we are following our own way. But if we watch carefully, and counsel with our brethren, we shall understand; for the promise is, "The meek will He guide 
                                                                           23
in judgment: and the meek will He teach His way." We must not allow human ideas and natural inclinations to gain the supremacy.--Letter 139, 1902.
